quotes.message: If you want to forget something or someone, never hate it, or never hate him.her. Everything and everyone that you hate is engraved upon your heart; if you want to let go of something, if you want to forget, you cannot hate.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: Renew, release, let go. Yesterday's gone. There's nothing you can do to bring it back. You can't should've done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: I realise there's something incredibly honest about trees in winter, how they're experts at letting things go.
quotes.name: Jeffrey McDaniel

quotes.message: Think about any attachments that are depleting your emotional reserves. Consider letting them go.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: You can't reach for anything new if your hands are still full of yesterday's junk.
quotes.name: Louise Smith

quotes.message: Rather than wasting time on yesterday that is gone, it is better to invest your time in tomorrow that is not yet born.
quotes.name: RVM

quotes.message: People have an annoying habit of remembering things they shouldn't.
quotes.name: Christopher Paolini

quotes.message: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: The past is behind, learn from it. The future is ahead, prepare for it. The present is here, live it.
quotes.name: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.message: Forgiving does not erase the bitter past. A healed memory is not a deleted memory. Instead, forgiving what we cannot forget creates a new way to remember. We change the memory of our past into a hope for our future.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: Forgive, forget. Bear with the faults of others as you would have them bear with yours.
quotes.name: Phillips Brooks

quotes.message: By forgetting the past and by throwing myself into other interests, I forget to worry.
quotes.name: Jack Dempsey

quotes.message: Our achievements speak for themselves. What we have to keep track of are our failures, discouragements and doubts. We tend to forget the past difficulties, the many false starts, and the painful groping.
quotes.name: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.message: I don't live in the past at all; I'm always wanting to do something new. I make a point of constantly trying to forget and get things out of my mind.
quotes.name: Brian Eno

quotes.message: Letting go and forgetting the past is easier said than done, but never use the past as an excuse to not care about your future.
quotes.name: Jayden Hayes

quotes.message: I don't believe in forgetting the past, Because it's always going to be a part of my life.
quotes.name: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.message: Moving on isn't forgetting the past, it's learning from it.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Never forget the past, and hold no regrets for the mistakes you've made. forgetting the pastcan cause you to make the same mistakes again.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to forget what's gone, appreciate what still remains, and look forward to what's coming next.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The only thing a person can ever really do is keep moving forward. Take that big leap forward without hesitation, without once looking back. Simply forget the past and forge toward the future.
quotes.name: Alyson Noel

quotes.message: I think the secret to a happy life is a selective memory. Remember what you are most grateful for and quickly forget what your not.
quotes.name: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.message: The sadness in your heart is a yesterday you can no longer see, so put it behind you and walk always forward.
quotes.name: Catherine Anderson

quotes.message: Forgetting is something time alone takes care of, but forgiveness is an act of volition, and only the sufferer is qualified to make the decision
quotes.name: Simon Wiesenthal

quotes.message: You're just another story I can't tell anymore.
quotes.name: pleasefindthis, I Wrote This For You

quotes.message: There is no past that we can bring back by longing for it. There is only an eternally new now that builds and creates itself out of the Best as the past withdraws.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Who controls the past controls the future: who controls the present controls the past.
quotes.name: George Orwell

quotes.message: Man... cannot learn to forget, but hangs on the past: however far or fast he runs, that chain runs with him.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: The beauty of the past is that it is the past. The beauty of the now is to know it. The beauty of the future is to see where one is going.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It is sadder to find the past again and find it inadequate to the present than it is to have it elude you and remain forever a harmonious conception of memory.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Don't let yesterday use up too much of today.
quotes.name: Cherokee Indian Proverb

quotes.message: No man is rich enough to buy back his past.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: One problem with gazing too frequently into the past is that we may turn around to find the future has run out on us.
quotes.name: Michael Cibenko

quotes.message: The first recipe for happiness is: avoid too lengthy meditation on the past.
quotes.name: Andre Maurois

quotes.message: Do not let your shadow walk you. You are not a slave of the past.
quotes.name: Dodinsky

quotes.message: Brothers, I do not consider that I have made it my own.
quotes.name: Philippians 3:13

quotes.message: Remember not the former things, nor consider the things of old. Behold, I am doing a new thing; now it springs forth, do you not perceive it? I will make a way in the wilderness and rivers in the desert.
quotes.name: Isaiah 43:18-19

quotes.message: Let all bitterness and wrath and anger and clamor and slander be put away from you, along with all malice. Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.
quotes.name: Ephesians 4:31-32

quotes.message: I am he who blots out your transgressions for my own sake, and I will not remember your sins.
quotes.name: Isaiah 43:25

quotes.message: Forget past mistakes and forget failures. Forget everything except what you are going to do now and do it.
quotes.name: William J. Durant

quotes.message: We have to forget the past. History is something that even today we are paying the consequences, and the future is integration. We all as a people, as citizens, as the leadership of both countries should be looking in that direction.
quotes.name: Jaromir Jagr

quotes.message: Forget the past - the future will give you plenty to worry about.
quotes.name: George Allen, Sr.

quotes.message: Everybody's got a past. The past does not equal the future unless you live there.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: In the process of letting go you will lose many things from the past, but you will find yourself It will be a permanent Self, rooted in awareness and creativity. Once you have captured this, you have captured the world.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Holding on is believing that there's only a past; letting go is knowing that there's a future.
quotes.name: Daphne Rose Kingma

quotes.message: The knowledge of the past stays with us. To let go is to release the images and emotions, the grudges and fears, the clingings and disappointments of the past that bind our spirit.
quotes.name: Jack Kornfield

quotes.message: We must be willing to let go of the life we've planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: There is a time for departure, even when there is no certain place to go.
quotes.name: Tennessee William

quotes.message: You are responsible for your life. You can't keep blaming somebody else for your dysfunction. Life is really about moving on.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Moving on, is a simple thing, what it leaves behind is hard.
quotes.name: Dave Mustaine

quotes.message: Love is not all I crave . I know there's a world to save . But I've always done my best . And I think, I've passed every test . But there's something about a brand new heart .
quotes.name: David Wolinski

quotes.message: Today is the shadow of tomorrow . Today is the present future of yesterday . Yesterday is the shadow of today . The darkness of the past is yesterday .
quotes.name: Otis Jackson

quotes.message: The wisdom of the past is the light of the past . The light which is to be the wisdom of the future .
quotes.name: Otis Jackson

quotes.message: Yes, I'm looking for a better future and forgetting about the past . I'm looking for a better future and forgetting about the past .
quotes.name: Joe Bihari

quotes.message: More and more I'm forgetting the past . More and more I'm living at last .
quotes.name: Webb Pierce

quotes.message: Time may lie heavy between . But what has been . is past forgetting . This sweet memory . Across the years .
quotes.name: Noel Coward

quotes.message: I am controlling my future . I am forgetting my past . Making the best of the present . Those who don't are coming in last, aye .
quotes.name: Jamiinfinity

quotes.message: We're like candles burning in both ends . Like divers suffering from the bends . We'll hit the surface far too fast .
quotes.name: Joakim Akerman

quotes.message: And now loving is in living for forgetting your past . So now why the distant stare? . Could it be there is someone who remains .
quotes.name: Shawn Phillips

quotes.message: I need you to be more forgetting of the past . And for the future be more optimistic . Just for the night I need you not to be realistic .
quotes.name: Don Velli

quotes.message: Rolling on the highway one . Vibes, from the sea, everyone is with a smile . Living for today, forgetting all our past .
quotes.name: Juan Nacif

quotes.message: In her face he looks for traces . Of the woman he once knew . Not forgetting, past regretting .
quotes.name: Fahl

quotes.message: Something's here I'm not quite getting . Though I try, I keep forgetting . Like a memory long since past .
quotes.name: Danny Elfman

quotes.message: Bright lights and country music a bottle and a glass . Soon I'll be forgetting that there ever was a past . And when everybody asks me what helped me forget so fast .
quotes.name: Bill Anderson

quotes.message: And it feels like a hand grenade . That man, I'll never understand . Everyone's living in the past .
quotes.name: Alexander Amiruddin

quotes.message: I'm clean through no good of my own . But when You look at me You see Your Son . And I am clean . Looking back, my past is worth forgetting .
quotes.name: Jason Walker

quotes.message: We burn the candle at both ends . The circle turns, we start again . Let's make our future better than our past .
quotes.name: Baker

quotes.message: Driving way too fast . Living in the past . And never knowing that I'm happy .
quotes.name: Kevin Coyne

quotes.message: Back in the long stretch of loneliness . I have come to call a living, . I'm getting something for all this love's labor, . Even when I am forgetting.
quotes.name: Amy Elizabeth Ray

quotes.message: Getting up . I start anew . Forgetting all that I have put me through . Unraveling my past .
quotes.name: Aiis

quotes.message: Forget the past. Save the future.
quotes.name: Tim Kring

quotes.message: Think of yourself now. Forget the past. Live in the present. That's surprising. Normally, people say the opposite.
quotes.name: Claude Chabrol

quotes.message: There's no future for people who worship the future, and forget the past.
quotes.name: Tetsurô Sayama

quotes.message: I find life is easier if I can forget the past.
quotes.name: Nicholas Boxer

quotes.message: You've tried to forget the past for so long, but it has caused you nothing but unhappiness. Maybe it's time you tried to remember.
quotes.name: John Logan

quotes.message: There's an old saying about those who cannot remember the past being condemned to repeat it. But those of us who refuse to forget the past are condemned to relive it.
quotes.name: Mike Kelley

quotes.message: He's gonna be so sorry he lost you, so stop worrying. Forget the past. Forget the pain.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Young

quotes.message: You must forget the past. Despite who you are now, you will also become something more.
quotes.name: Denis Dyack

quotes.message: Building the future and keeping the past alive are one in the same thing.
quotes.name: Hideo Kojima

quotes.message: The furies bloat the present with the undigested past. . 'Memory and oblivion, we call that imagination.' . We dream in order to forget.
quotes.name: Lewis Hyde

quotes.message: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead--that is where your future lies.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Stop acting as if life is a rehearsal. Life this day as if it were your last. The past is over and gone. The future is not guaranteed.
quotes.name: Dr. Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: True reconciliation does not consist in merely forgetting the past.
quotes.name: Winnie Mandela

quotes.message: I leave the past behind and with hands outreached to what ever lies ahead I go straight for the goal.
quotes.name: Phil 03:13-14

quotes.message: There ain't no future in the past in the past. You can't change yesterday, but you can do something about your tomorrow.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: The past is really almost as much a work of the imagination as the future.
quotes.name: Jessamyn West

quotes.message: The past actually happened but history is only what someone wrote down.
quotes.name: A. Whitney Brown

quotes.message: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Certain past experiences reminds us of those times in which we wish would just go away. More often than not, these memories live in the subconscious part of our minds. It's these memories, which can suddenly turn a good time into bad.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: Sometimes when you feel completely powerless to a situation in your life, all you can do is let go. Sometimes letting go is all it takes to create the change you want.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: Keep moving. Exercise will make you feel better. It's a fact. Do not rush into being a superwoman at the gym or joining a team to run a marathon right after the breakup.
quotes.name: Lesley Robins

quotes.message: You can't change the past. It was what it was, and we learn and grow from our experiences so next time we're better equipped to make self-honoring choices.
quotes.name: Lesley Robins

quotes.message: The trick to having more good time, is to do your best to focus on what you've learned from your past life challenges.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: Despite the heartache and loss, the reason you are not hearing from me is that I am too busy taking care of myself moving on with my fabulous life.
quotes.name: Greg Behrendt

quotes.message: You gladly accept this radio silence because your relationship has been broken for a while, and get on with your grieving because you are moving on to something better.
quotes.name: Greg Behrendt

quotes.message: Now, defeating kryptonite and getting over a broken heart is incredibly tough. It's also wildly empowering. But the even bigger victory is finally living your own life again without the constant presence of heartache.
quotes.name: Greg Behrendt

quotes.message: The hard truth is that breakups are sink-or-swim. Some people spend their life in an emotional downward spiral because they can't get over lost love. Others, most notably you, use it as a turning point to reevaluate, rebuild, and possibly redecorate.
quotes.name: Greg Behrendt

quotes.message: Firewood becomes ash, and it does not become firewood again.
quotes.name: Lewis Hyde
